bioconda.name: bioconductor-cn.farms
bioconda.summary: cn.FARMS - factor analysis for copy number estimation

biotools.summary: This package implements the cn.FARMS algorithm for copy number variation (CNV) analysis. It allows to analyze the most common Affymetrix (250K-SNP6.0) array types, supporting high-performance computing using snow and ff.

bioschemas.name: cn.farms
bioschemas.summary: This package implements the cn.FARMS algorithm for copy number variation (CNV) analysis. It allows to analyze the most common Affymetrix (250K-SNP6.0) array types, supporting high-performance computing using snow and ff.
